Html: I'm using WPF toolkit charting. One of my chart uses LinearAxis and when the range is too low then it displays the chart interval in decimals. I dont want my chart to pick the decimal values for interval. For example my MaxY and MinY are 5, 0, then my chart interval is 0.5, 1.5 etc.. i want the interval to be 1, 2, 3, 4 etc.. i dont want to hard code the values of the interval on the linear axis.
